```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv(here('FEF/SSFP_slug_2020.csv'))

df$Date <- mdy_hm(df$Date)

```

```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = SC, color = Site))

```
